messages.subject: Fw: [UnschoolingDiscussion] kelly-liquid sky
messages.msgSnippet: oops-forgot to give the address www.facets.org ... From: James & Lari Johnston To: UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com Sent: Tuesday, May 11, 2004 8:48 AM
messages.messageBody:
oops-forgot to give the address
www.facets.org

----- Original Message -----
From: James & Lari Johnston
To: UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, May 11, 2004 8:48 AM
Subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] kelly-liquid sky


Kelly and All-
Don't know if you're familiar with Facets Multimedia. They're located in Chicago and have a rent by mail system for unlimited movies-$24.00 a month , I think. They're one of the largest video (dvd) and film distributors in the country specializing in rare, foreign, and out of print films. They have Liquid Sky.
Lari

----- Original Message -----
From: Kelly Lenhart
To: UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, May 11, 2004 8:40 AM
Subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Netflix - was Insight Needed - LONG


We are new Netflixers and so far I love it. We've had on unplayable, which
they replaced. And there has only been one movie I wanted which they don't
have. (Liquid Sky. -sob-)

Kelly
